about_the_game:
If you've ever worried about being reincarnated in a fantasy world without any special powers, don't worry! You can waste your time grinding your stats up OR you can drink one potion to power yourself up to OP levels!
*Luka does not claim any responsibility for any unseen side effects that may include: loss of life, limbs, senses, or gaining a unique ability that lets you see anyone's kinks, fetishes, sensitive spo- …wait what?!

That's right, after drinking a potion brewed up by the mini-mage Luka, our protagonist gains the ability: Sex-Ray Vision! Using this skill, he hunts down the hottest adventurers and successfully seduces them, adding them to his harem! Take your horny harem on all kinds of quests, from apprehending bandits to rescuing princesses. Just remember you might spend more time baby making then actually fighting!


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Your whole harem is fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 27 scenes of fucking your harem just right!

Harem Hunter: Sex-Ray Vision Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe!
Her hair is red now, don't question it.
Oh yeah, right in my sacred forest~

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes containing non-consensual sex.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

name: Harem Hunter: Sex-ray Vision

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

short_description: Instead of X-Ray vision, our hero has unlocked the power of Sex-Ray vision! At a glance, see all of a girl’s dirty little secrets: their kinks, sensitive spots, and anything else you'll need to know to get them to leave their adventuring party and join your harem!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
